text: Hey Guys, we are new to HubSpot. We need to create a custom object and the only way to do that is through the API. We don't have any devs, Can anyone here help us to make that call from HubSpot team? We have the fields already designed.

You can actually use the HubSpot developer documentation page itself to create the object schema.

I forget who posted it last year, but a HubSpot partner posted a guide to doing so immediately after we released Custom Objects.

There may also be some app integration tools in the marketplace that can help in facilitating it.

Hello, i would like to build a plugin for uploading images for our Marketing Landing Pages.  Ideally a single button on the Marketing->Files page that goes to a page on our tool and allows users to upload images.  It could also just be a menu entry somewhere ‘My Image Uploader’ or something like that. The functionality of what we want to do is pretty simple. I am having trouble finding a jumping off point. I have found examples on building CRM cards, CMS tools… is this what I should start with? Even though I want to build it for Marketing->Files not the actual CMS tool?
I’m having a hard time understanding what you’re trying to do… care to ellaborate?
